DOC.brief_summary: In randomize study Xience V coroary artery stent may non inferior Cypher Select+ coronary stent treatment unselected patient coronary artery disease .
DOC.detailed_description: 2 Purpose In randomize study compare Cypher Select+ Xience V coronary stent treatment unselected patient coronary artery disease . 2.1 Primary objective In randomized study compare Xience V Cypher Select+ coronary stent assess SAFETY ( cardiac death , myocardial infarction and/or stent thrombosis ) EFFICACY ( target vessel revascularization ) 9 month . 2.2 Secondary objective To compare device success rate , procedure success rate complication rate hospitalization , 1 month 9 month incidence late stent thrombosis 12 , 24 36 month .
DOC.criteria: All patient treat one drug elute stent coronary artery one 5 heart centre Denmark ( Gentofte , Rigshospitalet , Odense , Skejby , Aalborg ) include study . The patient participate The patient participates randomise stent study Expected survival < 1 year Allergy Aspirin , Clopidogrel Ticlopidine Allergy Sirolimus ABT578
